text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.02.HepatitisB"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.02.HepatitisB

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.02.HepatitisB

title: IMMZ.DT.02.HepatitisB

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:01:17+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Hepatitis B vaccine as soon as possible after birth

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT02

action

title: Immunize Patient for Hepatitis B - No Doses and Premature birth or low birth weight

description: Provide Hepatitis B immunizations – using the "Hepatitis B vaccine immunization – Birth dose" schedule (Birth dose)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Hepatitis B vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because no doses and (low birth weight or premature infant)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Patient birth weight observation value" < "2000g"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because no doses and (low birth weight or premature infant)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Weeks" < 2text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because no doses and (low birth weight or premature infant)

definition: IMMZ.DT.02.HepatitisB.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Hepatitis B - No Doses

description: Provide Hepatitis B immunizations – using the "Hepatitis B vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Hepatitis B vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because no doses

definition: IMMZ.DT.02.HepatitisB.03

action

title: Immunize Patient for Hepatitis B - 1 Dose

description: Provide Hepatitis B immunizations – using the "Hepatitis B vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Hepatitis B vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because 1 dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Hepatitis B dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because 1 dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.02.HepatitisB.04

action

title: Immunize Patient for Hepatitis B - 2 Doses

description: Provide Hepatitis B immunizations – using the "Hepatitis B vaccine immunization – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Hepatitis B vaccine immunization history" = "2 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because 2 doses

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Hepatitis B dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because 2 doses

definition: IMMZ.DT.02.HepatitisB.05
